biotools.summary: MicroRNA set analysis. Test the functional and disease annotations of miRNAs by overrepresentation analysis, compare the input de-regulated miRNAs with those de-regulated in other disease conditions via correlation analysis. Also miRNA set query and result visualization are also enabled.
